content: हृद् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} (This word has no forms for the fist five inflections, and is optionally substituted for हदय after <ab>acc.</ab> dual) {@--1@} The mind, heart. = {@--2@} The chest, bosom, breast; इमां हृदि व्यायतपातमक्षिणोत् <ls>Ku. 5. 54.</ls> {@--3@} The soul. {@--4@} The interior or essence. of anything.
